sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Croatian: Ratni krik za pravdu bio je sve više - mnogo na Chagr Vlasti.
backtrans: The war cry for justice was more and much on Chagr authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Croatian: Odluka režima adumbrita temeljne dnevnog reda.
backtrans: Decision to the Adumbrite Regime of the Fundamental Agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Croatian: Zajednica je bila zabrinuta zbog prijenosa važećih reformi.
backtrans: The community was worried about the transfer of valid reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Croatian: Think Tank je objavio papir koji opisuje svoju ispriku kapitalne kazne.
backtrans: Think Tank has published a paper describing his apology for a capital sentence.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Croatian: Aught je ostao od valjanosti peticije
backtrans: AUGHT has remained from the validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Croatian: Predsjednik je potaknuo svoje ministre kako bi se pričvrstilo kao ključnu opozicijsku potporu za njegov ekonomski plan bio je pričvrstiti.
backtrans: The president prompted his ministers to fasten as a key opposition support for his economic plan to attach.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Croatian: Birači su bili teni da vide da je račun prošao.
backtrans: The voters were tense to see the account passed.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Croatian: Pravništvo je diskurzivna naracija zamrljavala žiri.
backtrans: The lawyard has discouraged narcissing the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Croatian: Blok EU-a protivio se eventualnom uvođenju antidampinških mjera.
backtrans: The EU block opposed to the possible introduction of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Croatian: Ispunjen hvalospjev dostavljao je lukavski odvjetnik.
backtrans: The fulfilled praise was delivered by a tricky lawyer.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Croatian: Agencija za Gig-gospodarstvo odlučila je ukrasiti povrat!
backtrans: The GIG-Economy Agency has decided to decorate the refund!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Croatian: Članovi anti-teokratskog revolucionarnog pokreta srušili su vršnjake na vlasti!
backtrans: The members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement collapsed peers in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.

backtrans: The winners were disappointed could fight with colonialists.
